text: Light Years Away () is a 1981 Swiss French drama movie directed by Alain Tanner and starring Trevor Howard, Mick Ford, Bernice Stegers, Gerard Mannix Flynn, Henri Virlojeux, Joe Pilkington, Odile Schmitt. ==Other websites== * Category:1981 drama movies Category:Swiss drama movies Category:French drama movies Category:Movies directed by Alain Tanner
title: Light Years Away
